DARS Approval & Delegation Matrix
(30 November 2023) *All common delegations can be found within the DARS text. *Further Delegable Columns with "No" indicate retained responsibilities or those that are non-delegable or cannot be delegated further per regulation or statue.
Conducting a preaward peer review for competitive and non-competitive procurements above $1B, and any designated MDAP/USD(A&S) special interest programs.
Conducting component preaward peer reviews for competitive procurements valued at $500M or more but less than $1B; and noncompetitive procurements valued at $500 or more but less than $1B.
